translations: adj.要求不高的；容易的；不严格的

phrs.translation: 容易的, 要求不高的, 随和的

sentences.sentence: After the first pair of tasks was completed, one group of participants was assigned an undemanding activity intended to cause their minds to wander.
sentences.translation: 在第一对任务完成后，一组参与者被分配了一个要求不高的活动，目的是让他们走神。

sentences.sentence: Relatively undemanding milestones will quite soon take Fiat’s stake in Chrysler up to 35%.
sentences.translation: 此种相对要求不高的标准很快将使菲亚特持有克莱斯勒的股权达到35%。

sentences.sentence: This allows them to take root in undemanding applications within a new market or arena of competition.
sentences.translation: 这使他们能够扎根于要求不高的应用的一个新的市场或竞争性的领域。
